definition: to knock against/to bump into/to run into/to meet by accident

sentences.english: It also has separate firing pin that was operated by hammer.
sentences.chinese: 它還具有獨立的撞針，是由錘經營。

sentences.english: So she took the firing pin out of the gun.
sentences.chinese: 所以，她把槍裏的撞針卸了出來。

sentences.english: The bolt has firing pin milled in its body.
sentences.chinese: 螺栓的撞針在其體內精。

sentences.english: On real guns, some firing pins may be magnetized by strong magnets, causing misfire.
sentences.chinese: 在真槍，一些撞針可通過強大的磁場磁化，導致失火。

sentences.english: Rust on the butt plate hinge spring, Private Bullshit. Revoked. Name?
sentences.chinese: 撞針生鏽了，二等兵狗屎。外出取消。名字？

sentences.english: Grimlock and Impactor meet Megatron within the arenas.
sentences.chinese: 鋼鎖與撞針於大角鬥場結識威震天。

sentences.english: It'll cut the power long enough for you to step off without removing the pin.
sentences.chinese: 我幫你切斷電源，你在不觸動撞針的情況下擡腳。

sentences.english: On the boulevard he noticed that the pistol had no trigger.
sentences.chinese: 走到林蔭大道上，他發現那手槍沒有撞針。

sentences.english: Oslash; Grimlock and Impactor meet Megatron within the arenas.
sentences.chinese: 鋼鎖與撞針於大角鬥場結識威震天。
